activities:
We intend to process and store personal data relating to our customers (login details and contact information for individual users), personal data relating to third parties (journalist contact data or otherwise appropriately sourced third party personal data) and employee data (contact telephone, email, pictures, next of kin) on our US servers.

The information will be processed at source in the EEA and/or Switzerland, but, will be electronically stored in the US where it will then be accessible by encrypted user login either by a customer or by an employee.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All data covered is electronically processed. The data will cover: organisational data, client contact data to include contact information about specific customers and their login date, contact information related to third party data subjects, information gleaned from cookies on our corporate website and employee data. We do not store or process sensitive personal data.
privacyprograms: We are registered with  the the Better Business Bureau Online Safe Harbor service:  https://www.auto.bbb.org/scripts/cgiip.exe/WService=SafeHarb/EUHarbor/euapp.w
recoursemech: We are registered the the Better Business Bureau Online Safe Harbor service for this purpose:  https://www.auto.bbb.org/scripts/cgiip.exe/WService=SafeHarb/EUHarbor/euapp.w
